item.title: dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant
item.description:
dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant

The sign beside the interior door reads "Press for Food." If you're in front of it, you've just walked through the bustling East Village cocktail bar The Garret East, beyond a curtain, into a petite corridor. A push of the analog button sends a chime to the inside and you're promptly greeted.

item.title: There's brew love in a new lager saga: Daniel Noah Sheikh reinvents beer.
item.description:
There's brew love in a new lager saga: Daniel Noah Sheikh reinvents beer.

The crafting and consumption of artisanal ale has come to define hipsterdom as surely as unchecked facial hair and tattoos. Lager, once the fashionable brew, has been largely left out in the cold. One young MÃ¼nchner, though, is determined on rebuilding buzz around bold but bubbly Bavarian beer.

item.title: Jet Engine Espresso Machines : veloce espresso
